resources.string: Please enable the Git Sync Accessibility Service!

To enhance your experience, GitSync uses Android’s Accessibility Service to detect when apps are opened or closed. This helps us provide tailored features without storing or sharing any data. 

 Key Points: 
 Purpose: We use this service solely to improve your app experience. 
 Privacy: No data is stored or sent elsewhere. 
 Control: You can disable these permissions at any time in your device settings.
<GitSync Error> Tap to send a bug report
Enable notifications permission to see more.
This may take a while depending on the size of your repo

It looks like this is your first time here.

Would you like to go through a quick setup to get started?

You can use GitSync without granting notification permissions, but we recommend enabling them for the best experience.

The app uses notifications for 
 • popup sync messages
 • bug reports

You can use GitSync without granting "All files access" permissions, but we recommend enabling it for the best experience.

The app uses "All files access" for syncing your repository more consistently to a less limited range of directories on the device.

Soon, we'll authenticate with GitHub.com and clone your repo to your device, preparing it for syncing.

Once that's set, there are several ways to trigger a sync:

 • The GitSync quick tile
 • The in-app "Sync Now" button
 • Application Observer for auto-sync
 • A custom intent (advanced)
Please authenticate with Github and continue on to clone your repo!

To enhance your experience,
GitSync uses Android’s Accessibility Service to detect when apps are opened or closed.

This helps us provide tailored features without storing or sharing any data.
Select a folder to clone into
Network unavailable!\nGitSync will retry when reconnected
Inaccessible! Please select a different directory.
Remote is further ahead than local and we could not automatically rebase for you, as it would cause non fast-forward update.
Remote ref update was rejected, because remote side doesn\'t support/allow deleting refs.
Remote ref update was rejected because %s.
Remote ref update was rejected, because old object id on remote repository wasn\'t the same as defined expected old object.
